app.title: Rifa Fácil
app.description: Manage and participate in raffles easily.

homePage.welcomeSubtitle: Your one-stop solution for creating and managing raffles effortlessly.
homePage.noRafflesDescription: Get started by creating your first raffle!

deleteDialog.title: Confirm Deletion
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete the raffle "{{raffleName}}"? This action cannot be undone.
deleteDialog.successDescription: The raffle "{{raffleName}}" has been successfully deleted.
deleteDialog.errorDescription: Could not delete raffle "{{raffleName}}". Only open raffles with no sales or closed raffles can be deleted.
deleteDialog.disabledTooltip: Cannot delete: this raffle is open and has sold/pending numbers.

homePage.accountPendingActivationTooltip: Your account is pending activation. You cannot create raffles until it is active.

raffleDetailsPage.raffleNotFoundDescription: The raffle you are looking for does not exist or may have been removed.
raffleDetailsPage.configureDisabledTooltip: Configuration cannot be changed after sales have started or raffle is closed.

profitDialog.notePendingSales: Note: There are {{amount}} in pending payments not included in the profit calculation.

raffleDetailsPage.shareLinkCopiedDescription: Raffle link ({{url}}) copied to clipboard. Share it on Instagram!
raffleDetailsPage.exportErrorDescription: Could not export the image. Please try again.
raffleDetailsPage.exportSuccessDescription: Image of available numbers exported successfully.

updatePayment.errorDescription: Could not update payment. The number might no longer be pending.

editBuyer.dialogDescription: Current buyer: {{currentBuyerName}} ({{currentBuyerPhone}}). Enter new details below.
editBuyer.errorDescription: Could not update buyer details. Please ensure the number is purchased and try again.

cancelPurchase.dialogDescription: Enter the number whose purchase you want to cancel. This will make the number available again.
cancelPurchase.successDescription: Purchase for number #{{numberId}} has been cancelled. It is now available.
cancelPurchase.errorInvalidNumber: Invalid number. Please enter a valid number within the raffle range.
cancelPurchase.errorRaffleClosed: Cannot cancel purchase: The raffle is closed.
cancelPurchase.errorGeneric: Could not cancel the purchase. Please try again.

accessDenied.title: Access Denied
accessDenied.notLoggedInDescription: You must be logged in to create a raffle. Please log in to continue.

accountPending.title: Account Pending Approval
accountPending.descriptionPart1: Your account is currently pending approval by an administrator. You cannot create new raffles until your account is activated. For support, contact

accountInactive.title: Account Inactive
accountInactive.descriptionPart1: Your account is currently inactive. You cannot create new raffles. Please contact support at
accountInactive.descriptionPart2: if you believe this is an error.

configureForm.title: Create New Raffle
configureForm.description: Fill in the details below to set up your raffle.

placeholders.prizeDescription: E.g., Grand Prize: A new car
placeholders.identificationNumberHint: E.g., National ID, SSN, EIN of the account holder.
placeholders.transferInstructions: E.g., Include raffle name in transfer reference. You can also ask buyers to include their selected numbers.

validation.nameMin: Raffle name must be at least 3 characters.
validation.numberOfPrizesPositive: Number of prizes must be positive.
validation.referenceValueMin: Reference value must be 0 or greater.
validation.atLeastOnePrize: At least one prize is required.

toast.errorUpdate: Failed to update raffle. It might be locked or an issue occurred.
toast.creationDisabledPendingAccount: Your account is pending activation. You cannot create raffles yet.

configureForm.fieldsDisabledEdit: This field cannot be changed after creation if sales have started.

bankDetails.title: Bank Transfer Details
bankDetails.description: Fill in these details if you want to accept bank transfers. These will be shown to buyers if they choose 'Transfer' as payment method.

editRafflePage.title: Edit Raffle Configuration
editRafflePage.description: Modify the details of your raffle below. Some fields may be locked if sales have started.
editRafflePage.cannotEditDescriptionSales: This raffle cannot be edited because sales have already started.
editRafflePage.cannotEditDescriptionClosed: This raffle cannot be edited because it is closed.

purchaseForm.title: Purchase Numbers
purchaseForm.description: Select your numbers and fill in your details.
purchaseForm.noNumbersInRaffle: No numbers configured for this raffle yet.

toast.errorDescription: Failed to purchase numbers. Some might have been taken.
toast.errorRaffleState: Could not retrieve current raffle state. Please try again.
toast.copiedErrorDescription: Could not copy details to clipboard.

validation.nameMin: Name must be at least 2 characters.
validation.selectedNumbersMin: Please select at least one number.
validation.selectedNumbersUnavailableGeneral: One or more selected numbers are not available or have been taken.

purchaseForm.raffleClosedDescription: This raffle is no longer open for purchases.

grid.noNumbersInRaffle: No numbers configured for this raffle yet.

bankTransferDetails.title: Bank Transfer Information
bankTransferDetails.notConfiguredDescription: The organizer has not provided bank details for transfers for this raffle. Please choose another payment method or contact the organizer.
bankTransferDetails.selectedNumbersInstructionSuffix: Don't forget to include your full name and the selected numbers ({{selectedNumbersList}}) in the payment reference.
bankTransferDetails.selectedNumbersInstructionStandalone: Please include your full name and the selected numbers ({{selectedNumbersList}}) in the transfer reference.

availableNumbersPage.title: Available Numbers for "{{raffleName}}"
availableNumbersPage.listDescription: These numbers are still up for grabs! Each costs {{price}}.
availableNumbersPage.allSoldOut: All numbers have been sold or are pending payment!
availableNumbersPage.noBankDetailsProvided: No bank details have been provided for this raffle.
availableNumbersPage.exportAllSuccessDescription: Image of available numbers and bank details exported successfully.
availableNumbersPage.exportDisabledRaffleClosedTooltip: Export not available: raffle is closed.

drawPage.drawOnePrizeHint: Only one prize will be drawn per click.
drawPage.noPrizesDefinedInRaffle: No prizes have been configured for this raffle.
drawPage.morePrizesHint: {{count}} more prize(s) to draw after this one.

toast.infoAllPrizesAwardedOrClosed: All prizes have been awarded or the raffle is closed.
toast.infoNoMorePrizesThisRound: No more prizes to award in this round.
toast.raffleCompleteDescription: All prizes have been awarded. The raffle is now closed.

toast.statusUpdateErrorNotAdmin: Only administrators can change user status.
